## R Markdown


```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
url <-"html_top100.txt"
college_urls <- url %>%
  read_html() %>%
  html_node("body") %>% html_nodes("ol[class~=bEyEue]") %>% html_nodes("li[id]")%>% html_nodes("h3") %>% 
html_nodes("a[href]") %>%
  html_attr("href") 
college_urls

```
